title: [Question]Does your MS team Id and wifi change when ur branch changes??(EC Campus)
content: My teams id is not yet updated and I am using wifi from my previous SRN.will there be prblm in future and how do I rectify this....

comments.body: If ur srn changes everyhting related will change so yes. Give it a  week or 2 they will tell all CoB and CoC to check and update pesuacademy.
